objects.name: Analytic 0322
objects.description: Phishing attempts via iCloud Mail, Gmail, or social media apps accessed on macOS systems. Defender view includes Mail.app or Safari downloads of files followed by osascript, Terminal, or abnormal child process execution.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Received messages containing embedded links or attachments from non-enterprise services

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of osascript, bash, or Terminal initiated from Mail.app or Safari

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Suspicious outbound HTTPS requests to domains flagged as newly registered or untrusted after spearphishing message interaction

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Flagging mismatched or self-signed certificates during outbound connections initiated after spearphishing messages.
Window of time between attachment download and subsequent suspicious execution.
